title: Secrets of the ant and insect world
brief_description: Presents facts about the subterranean world of the ant, including a description of the warfare that persists between rival tribes of ants and their desperate struggle to protect their nests from invasion. Discusses in detail the honey-cask, hunting and leafcutter ants. Origianlly released as part of the Disney feature ‘Secrets of life’.
